title: Former Bachelorette Desiree Siegfried
description:
In our ongoing Bachelorette series, Rachel and Becca are joined by Desiree (Hartsock) Siegfried! Desiree talks about her marriage and two children with Chris, and she opens up about why she came on the show in the first place. Rachel and Desiree also discuss their similar experiences coming off the show and the toll it took on their relationships. 

Plus, Desiree shares the story about launching her faith-based podcast and reveals how she offers up inspiration during these times. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsor: 

Chrysler: PacificaHappyHour.com
